ticklish.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who is ticklish laughs a lot when you tickle them
ticklish.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a ticklish situation or problem is difficult and must be dealt with carefully, especially because you may upset people
ticklish.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Handling awkward neighbours can be a ticklish business.
ticklish.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a ticklish cough is in your throat rather than in your chest
